quote.quotepara: gbak: ERROR:Malformed string gbak:Exiting before completion due to errors
The same happens when I use an Interbase 6.5 database file. Any ideas what might be wrong?

body.para: Except you not reading migration guides? Using non-ascii chars in metadata.
